## Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines (Black, isort, flake8)
- [ ] All linting checks pass
- [ ] Type hints added for public functions
- [ ] Docstrings follow NumPy format

### Documentation

- [ ] Updated relevant documentation files
- [ ] Updated both English and French versions (if applicable)
- [ ] Added examples in docstrings
- [ ] Updated CHANGELOG.md

### Review

- [ ] Self-review performed
- [ ] Code is commented, particularly in complex areas
- [ ] No unnecessary debug prints or commented code
- [ ] Git history is clean (meaningful commit messages)
